text: The Mauritian ambassador in Beijing is the official representative of the Government in Port Louis to the Government of the People's Republic of China. ==List of representatives== {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic agrément/Diplomatic accreditation !| Ambassador !| Observations !| Prime Minister of Mauritius !| Premier of the People's Republic of China !| Term end |- | | |The governments in Port Louis and Beijing established diplomatic relations. |Seewoosagur Ramgoolam |Zhou Enlai | |- | |Ameen Kasenally | |Seewoosagur Ramgoolam |Zhou Enlai | |- | |Ahmed Ould Menneya | |Anerood Jugnauth |Hua Guofeng | |- | |Abdool Hak Mohamed Osman | |Anerood Jugnauth |Zhao Ziyang | |- | |Dhurma Gian Nath | |Anerood Jugnauth |Li Peng | |- | |Rhafic Jahangeer | |Anerood Jugnauth |LI Peng | |- | |Marie Amelie Lam Po Tang |née AH CHUEN 朱志筠 |Anerood Jugnauth |Zhu Rongji | |- | |Lim Kwat Chow Lam Po Tang |"Setai" LAM PO TANG 林德超 Tang |Anerood Jugnauth |Zhu Rongji | |- | |Paul Reynold Lit Fong Chong Leung |Paul CHONG LEUNG 钟律芳Paul Reynold Lit Fong Chong Leung |Anerood Jugnauth |Wen Jiabao |- | |Miao Kwong Lee Hon Chong |André LEE 李淼光 |Anerood Jugnauth |Li Keqiang | |} , The diplomatic service of the People's Republic of China as of November 1984, Institut für Asienkunde, 1985 - 120 S.,p. 104, Mauritian Embassy in Beijing, China, == References == China Mauritius
title: List of ambassadors of Mauritius to China
